component.summary: Top panel that holds indicators and the applications menu
包含指示器和应用程序菜单的顶部面板
Верхня панель індикаторів стану та меню застосунків

Horný panel, ktorý obsahuje indikátory a ponuku aplikácií

Painel superior que contém ícones e o menu de aplicativos
Painel superior que contém indicadores e o menu de aplicações
Górny panel, który przechowuje wskaźniki i menu aplikacji

インジケーターとアプリケーションメニューを表示する最上部のパネル

A felső állapotsor, amin különféle kijelzések és az alkalmazásmenü helyezkedik el
לוח עליון שמציג את ההתראות ואת תפריט היישומים

Toppanel, der indeholder indikatorer og applikationsmenuen

لوحة علوية تحمل المؤشرات وقائمة التطبيقات

description.p: The extensible top panel for Pantheon. Wingpanel is an empty container that accepts indicators as extensions, including the applications menu.

ul.li: Fix startup delay on the greeter
Fix some issues with indicator sort order
Adjust special icon colors for dark and light panels to improve contrast
Fix getting monitor dimensions under Wayland
Hide tooltips when indicators are open
Fix a potential issue when ending the session
Fix an issue with some 3 monitor layouts
Fix an issue where moving windows to a secondary display above the panel wouldn't work

description.p: Fix an issue with the panel being draggable on touch screens
Fix focus on dialogs launched from the panel
